channel.title: Gauntlet Comics: Project Lycra in July
channel.description:
Wednesday nights in July, I'm going to be running a playtest of my best buddy Jen's newest game design - Project Lycra. ![](upload://iCIECyCNi8BJr80t3zc4ilgdGhk.png) What's Project Lycra? It's "Grown-Up Masks with Feels".
Jen started with the Masks Adult Moves and has created new Team Mechanics as well as a track for confidence vs. trust. Have you ever wanted to play a grown-up superhero using the core concepts of PbtA and Masks inspiration? This just might be your jam! I'll be running the game, and Jen will be playing. Be advised, this game is in an early state of development, so things might change between sessions. Trust me though, she'll be making it more awesome each time.
-----------------------------------
This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries.
Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
The X-Card safety tool will be on the table. For more information on the Gauntlet's safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html)
This game session will be recorded for future publication.
[date=2019-07-03 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-03 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 01 of 04](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li3XrRVnhwAbj6bCf5D) [date=2019-07-10 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-10 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 02 of 04](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li3XxEdkQi-ZVAnHWGS) [date=2019-07-17 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-17 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 03 of 04](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li3Y0SzJogyw3dlnCjL) [date=2019-07-24 time=21:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2019-07-24 time=24:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 04 of 04](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Li3Y4rq-XmKWmn8ldYz)

item.title: Gauntlet Comics: Project Lycra in July
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

Wednesday nights in July, I’m going to be running a playtest of my best buddy Jen’s newest game design - Project Lycra.

1280×720 414 KB

What’s Project Lycra? It’s “Grown-Up Masks with Feels”.

Jen started with the Masks Adult Moves and has created new Team Mechanics as well as a track for confidence vs. trust. Have you ever wanted to play a grown-up superhero using the core concepts of PbtA and Masks inspiration? This just might be your jam! I’ll be running the game, and Jen will be playing. Be advised, this game is in an early state of development, so things might change between sessions. Trust me though, she’ll be making it more awesome each time.

This game is part of the ongoing Gauntlet Comics series. Characters and settings created in this miniseries will exist in the Gauntlet Comics canon (and on our wiki) for future miniseries.

Being able to attend every session is not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.

The X-Card safety tool will be on the table. For more information on the Gauntlet’s safety tools, please refer to our Inclusivity Policy on the website (http://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html)

This game session will be recorded for future publication.
